segments.text: So what do you feel like doing this evening ? How about going to the cinema ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah , that's a good idea . But I heard the film club of our school would show a film for free . Maybe we don't need to go to the cinema .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good ! I've also heard there will be a party held by the Students ' Union tomorrow evening . Would you like to go with me tomorrow night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to , but I'm afraid I can't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? Do you have to prepare for your examination ? Oh , come on , girl , relaxation is also very important .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's not the reason . I have to go to the English Corner tomorrow evening . You know , I've been going there every week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You said you wanted to improve your English , so how about coming with me tomorrow ? I can also introduce some friends to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no , I don't want to know any more geeks like you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are not geeks . They are also interested in singing , dancing , and so on . They are excellent , and they can always help me a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Is there a foreign teacher for every class ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends . If they are not busy , they will come to join us , and talk with us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you just talk all the time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course not . The foreign teachers also teach us English songs , and play games with us .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds interesting . I'll go with you tomorrow evening .
segments.speaker: S1
